attributes.action: Halfords to honour Bridgestone tyre purchases
attributes.additional_details:
We want Halfords Autocentre to honour their customers who purchased Bridgestone 20555R16 91W ER300 tyres from their website for the advertised fitted and balanced price of £0.00.

Our cars were booked in to have these tyres fitted, but Halfords claim that - "We do not sell tyres at £0.00 value at any time and Bridgestone tyres advise us that the ER300 pattern tyre was superseded some time ago and therefore these aren’t a pattern available in current range."

The tyres ARE actually still made, and this was false advertisement. They should honour their mistake.

rejection.details: This appears to be a commercial offer.
